issues.title: do we need to be able to support multi domain "tree" of roles?
issues.author: rohanmahy
issues.body:
Alice invites Bob and Cathy from different orgs/domains:

- Alice can add and remove participants from any org
- Adam can add and remove participants from within Adam's org
- Bob can add and remove participants from within Bob's org
- Cathy can add and remove participants from within Cathy's org
 
In the model where there is a single role per user this could be modeled with separate roles:
- room_admin
- a.example_admin
- b.example_admin
- c.example_admin

In a multiple role per user model, this could be modeled if the role hierarchy was a tree

issues.title: Requirements and information associated with bans?
issues.author: rohanmahy
issues.body:
Timo suggests:
- Time the ban expires (if ever)
- who initiated the ban
- the reason for the ban

optionally the (list of) old role(s) could be stored.

This may be different from a suspension that allows a user to still view messages, or something similar.
